channel.title: Lul, you stole my fish
channel.description:
LOL!!! This is funny :P [img]http://newmedia.funnyjunk.com/pictures/fish.jpg[/img]
tell me if you lol'd

item.title: Lul, you stole my fish
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

The Un-Named:

You guys do know, just quoting someone else without saying anything(aka chain quoting) can get you moderated for a week?

Are you on a period?

Lol, someone just sent me this a few minutes ago, I’m like…Ironic?

Read full topic

item.title: Lul, you stole my fish
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Bang Train, post:6, topic:134621”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=186019.msg1683179#msg1683179 date=1187418916]
You guys do know, just quoting someone else without saying anything(aka chain quoting) can get you moderated for a week?
[/quote]it is used way too much these days isnt it?[/quote]

Yeah.

[quote=“jme_009, post:7, topic:134621”][quote author=Bang Train link=topic=186019.msg1683441#msg1683441 date=1187427562]

You guys do know, just quoting someone else without saying anything(aka chain quoting) can get you moderated for a week?
[/quote]it is used way too much these days isnt it?

I remember when someone would do it and everyone would be all confused wondering why they quoted someone without saying anything lol.[/quote]

Yeah, I used to remember that also. It still happens, kinda, when someone posts inside someone else’s quote(how the hell can someone do this?) they complain they didn’t write anything but it’s a few lines up.

Ok, back on topic now.

Read full topic
